analysis: The project currently lacks a cohesive UI theme related to black holes. The existing CSS and HTML files need to be enhanced to reflect a cosmic, dark theme with animations and interactive elements that align with the topic of black holes. The theme should include animations for black hole visuals, swirling effects, and glowing elements to create an immersive experience.

improvements.description: Implement a dark, cosmic theme with animations for black hole visuals, swirling effects, and glowing elements.
Add a mobile-friendly navigation menu with a hamburger icon for better usability on mobile devices.
Fix syntax errors in the showSlide function and complete the JavaScript content to ensure all functions are properly implemented.
